description:
Go (also commonly referred to as golang) is an open source programming language developed at Google. Go is system programming language like C and C++, but provides in built rich and advance features like control constructs, storage classes, garbage collection and concurrency. This talks will introduce golang and its features, with simple code-snippet demos. 

Link:
http://nosconf.github.io/
title: Ready to GO! : Atin Mukherjee
